summary: A little orphaned girl joins a freak-show circus troupe whose members rape and abuse her. She then finds a glimmer of hope in the enigmatic magician who joins the group.
cast: Minako Naka|Norihiko Morishita|Keinosuke Okamoto|Kazuyoshi Hayashi|Yoshifumi Nomura|Sanae Katô|Yumiko Takagi|Akiko Tanaka|Kôji Imoto|Yoshihiko Matsui|Kinu Yoshimi|Karuki Tamazukuri
title: Midori
